page.title: 03OUR GAMES
page.content: ROUNDERS FOR ROUNDERS YOU NEED A BAT AND IT IS ABOUT TWO INCHES THICK AND THE ROUNDERS BALL IS HARD. YOU HAVE TWO TEAMS A BATTING TEAM AND A FIELDING TEAM.TO GET A ROUNDER YOU HAVE TO HIT THE BALL HARD AND RUN ALL THE WAY ROUND. FOOTBALL FOR FOOTBALL YOU NEED A BIG BALL AND TWO PEOPLE UP ATTACK. TWO PEOPLE IN MIDFIELD. THERE IS TWO PEOPLE IN DEFENCE AND THERE IS ONE IN GOAL. THERE IS TWO IN RIGHT AND LEFT WING THE AIM OF FOOTBALL IS TO SCORE AS MANY GOALS AS YOU CAN IN THE OPPOSITIONS GOAL.
